data.actual_result: Discord crashes. Don't seem to affect devices running Android Oreo
data.expected_result: It should redirect you to Google Play to install Spotify app
data.short_description: If you don't have Spotify installed and tap on the song title in a "Invite to listen along on Spotify" box, Discord crashes
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Spotify isn't installed on your device - Have someone send an "Invite to listen along on Spotify" through Desktop - View it on Android and tap the song title currently playing
